channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says Biden's handlers used autopen to betray the U.S.
item.description: The White House insiders who let President Biden use the autopen committed treason, according to President Trump.

item.title: Jen Psaki Provided Political Cover For Biden’s Ghost Presidency
item.description: Jen Psaki has provided excuse after excuse to try to explain away Biden's mental decline and prop up his ghost presidency.

item.title: Bitcoin touches all-time high and Treasury yields cross 5% again
